name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [b]Your strength is commendable, the nine realms applaud your strength...[/b]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [b]For your heroism, I offer you a place at my side in the eternal battle of Valhalla[/b]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [b]Rest easy now, the day is won...[/b]

name: [center]Odin[/center]
text: [b][color=#00BFFF][i]Ragnarök[/i][/color] will not come today, you’ve seen to that[/b]
